TopicTitle: How do I get rid off the skybox?

Articles.Content: I want to get rid off it because it's low quality and mixes planets with the background. Is there a setting that i've missed or a mod that does this?
I think you need a mod for this.

^--- ...plus a black rectangle image to replace the stock skybox with.

(You can also look at high quality skyboxes that other people have made, but if your goal is to make planets stand out, you want a black skybox and Distant Object Enhancement.)

Edited October 18, 2016 by Streetwind
